name: BarcodeDecodeOptions
summary: Options controlling how 1D barcode decoding behaves.

methods.name: WithTileScan
methods.summary: Enables or disables tile scanning for multiple barcodes.

properties.name: Code39Checksum
properties.summary: Controls how Code39 checksum characters are handled during decode.

properties.name: MsiChecksum
properties.summary: Controls how MSI checksum digits are handled during decode.

properties.name: Code11Checksum
properties.summary: Controls how Code 11 checksum characters are handled during decode.

properties.name: PlesseyChecksum
properties.summary: Controls whether Plessey CRC validation is required during decode.

properties.name: EnableTileScan
properties.summary: Enables tile-based scanning for multiple barcodes in one image.

properties.name: TileGrid
properties.summary: Tile grid size for multi-scan (0 = auto, 2..4 recommended).
